caption.p: Concentration of biochemical oxygen demand (BOD 5) (top) and fecal coliform bacteria (FCB) (bottom) in output water under present climate and climate change for shallow narrow (SND and GEO) and conventional (P&S) soil treatment areas. Values are means (n = 3) at each sampling date. Boxes represent the median and interquartile range, whiskers represent the 10 th and 90 th percentiles, and dots represent values outside the 10 th and 90 th percentiles for all sample dates.
